titleStmt.title: Whereas the sins of prophane swearing and cursing are offenses forbidden by the word of God, and do highly provoke his wrath, not onely against the persons that are guilty thereof but also against the place where such crimes are permitted to pass unpunished ... by the Lord Lieutenant and Council, Ormonde.
titleStmt.author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1661-1669 : Ormonde)
Ormonde, James Butler, Duke of, 1610-1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by John Crooke ... and are to be sold by Samuel Dancer ...,

notesStmt.note: Title from first 6 lines of text.
Statement of responsibility transposed from head of title.
"Given at the Council chamber in Dublin the 8th day of February, 1665" [1666]
Reproduction of original in the Society of Antiquaries Library, London.
